column4: did somebody got kismet working on his Ubunut? I cant get it working :(
does the new version 6.06 new wifi drivers?
that gets kismet running for me. What card do you have?
ipw2200 is your type of wifi card d2812 ?
: you need to replace ipw2200 with your card type. I have a centrino so thats what i need there. I 'm afraid I dont know what you'd need for a dlink
my chipset is a Atheros d2812
i have now source=none,ath0,ATHEROS in the config
: where you have 'none' afaik you need the card type there.
nuruana: i'm just trying to look it up for ya.
nuruana: try replacing none with madwifi
nuruana: i'm reading this page atm http://tipsybottle.com/technology/wireless/RedHat8-Kismet-HOWTO.shtml
im afraid thats as far as i can get ya. sorry.
